name: Into Our Hands - Gold Contributor
metadata:
{"name": "Into Our Hands - Gold Contributor 1/4", "description": "'Into Our Hands' is an EP, collaborative crowdfund, and community embodied through art, stewarded by music/visual artist yadzi. Read more about this initiative at https://mirror.xyz/yadzi.eth


Gold Contributors will have:

- opportunity to submit a photo for the Intro Track Cover Artwork photo collage

- opportunity to submit audio for the Intro Track, and will be included in the split for the Intro Track NFT sale

- opportunity to submit a photo to be used as NFT Edition Cover Artwork for one of the songs from the EP, and collect 50% of revenue from the sale of the special edition featuring their hands

In addition tob�&

- early access to each EP song before itb�s officially released

- sneak preview of my very first music video, currently in post-production

- exclusive access to a never-before-seen live performance video

- token-gated access to private channels on yadzi Discord server


Proceeds from the sale of this NFT will go towards funding future creative endeavors by yadzi + his collaboration partners.


Thank you for your contribution!


Much love <3


yadzi", "image": "ipfs://bafybeidces3olliw3nqdggw4wfjie25wt3peaopo5paixarmfxfsj6frpa?id=1", "properties": {"number": 1, "name": "Into Our Hands - Gold Contributor"}}
